Read in Book Order Read in Chronological Order Read in Publication Order

Read Last Contact in Publication Order

What is it?

Publication order is designed to list chapters in the order they are published so if you are reading along with the creation of the story you will always know where to pick back up.

If you're new to this order start with: Act 00 - Prologue: Chapter 1 - Dedication

Go to: Dedication

Back to Top ↑

Initial Chapters

These are the chapters that were released when the site was initially launched.

November 12, 2024: Dedication

Story Date: November 2306 CE

Synopsis: Tim Li, the President of Humanity, consults with his closest advisors before one of the most important speeches of his career.

Focus Characters: Timothy Li, Allorien

Go to: Dedication

November 12, 2024: Acknowledgment

Story Date: November 2306 CE

Synopsis: Tim Li, the President of Humanity, gives a speech to all of humanity that may save, or end, his career.

Focus Characters: Timothy Li, Allorien

Go to: Acknowledgment

November 12, 2024: Beginning

Story Date: April 1995

Synopsis: Allorien watches an act of terrorism. Instructed not to interfere they are staggered by humanity's desire to fight each other.

Focus Characters: Allorien, Sai

Go to: Beginning

November 12, 2024: Memories

Story Date: May 2285

Synopsis: Alestra Amalee (codename: Ylena) sneaks into the underground storage vault of Terra Firma's Empire to steal her way to a new life.

Focus Characters: Alestra Amalee (codename: Ylena)

Go to: Memories

November 12, 2024: Revelations

Story Date: July 2285

Synopsis: The ending beats of a prison break occur as Tim Li and Samuel Knudsen are saved from the prison that is Saturn's third moon. They recover memories of their youth.

Focus Characters: Timothy Li, Jaedon Beyar (Xavix), Samuel Knudsen, Alestra Amalee (Ylena)

Go to: Revelations

November 12, 2024: Adjudication

Story Date: August 2285

Synopsis: Humanity is on trial. Fae and Allorien the two litigators are both charged with overseeing humanity. They have very differing opinions.

Focus Characters: Allorien, Fae

Go to: Adjudication

November 12, 2024: Detection

Story Date: September 2285

Synopsis: Sam struggles with his past. Tim learns we are not alone in the universe. It sparks just the littlest hope in the universe. One clings onto hope the other doesn't.

Focus Characters: Timothy Li, Allorien, Samuel Knudsen, Alestra Amalee

Go to: Detection

November 12, 2024: Contact

Story Date: October 2285

Synopsis: Tim and Allorien make contact. Although, Allorien broke the rules along the way. The strongest lasers in the history of humanity fire on Allorien.

Focus Characters: Timothy Li, Allorien

Go to: Contact

November 12, 2024: Spillover

Story Date: October 2019

Synopsis: Allorien changes the natural course of the universe and thinks a pandemic will help unite humanity against a common foe.

Focus Characters: Allorien

Go to: Spillover

November 12, 2024: World War Three

Story Date: September 2035

Synopsis: Humanity fights itself, again, in the third world war. The Eurasian Empire defends the city of Mariupol. Sai and Allorien witness the very thing they were trying to prevent. Sai retires.

Focus Characters: Allorien

Go to: World War Three

Back to Top ↑

November 2024

November 22, 2024: Fracture

Story Date: April 2112

Synopsis: One third of humanity leaves the only planet home we had ever known, Earth, to start a new life somewhere else. Allorien and their new junior Fae watch the process as it unfolds.

Focus Characters: Allorien, Fae

Go to: Fracture

November 29, 2024: Hatred

Story Date: May 2285

Synopsis: Chancellor Fulton Reacts to the theft of the memory cores from the underground vault and plans for a new system of control.

Focus Characters: Chancellor Fulton, Seraf√≠n Vera'Cruz

Go to: Hatred

Back to Top ↑

December 2024

December 6, 2024: The Three

Story Dates: December 2274, February 2276, June 2278

Synopsis: Sam, Gwen, and Tim all find different paths into Terra Firma's net. Trapped by the Chancellors orders the three of them don't know what comes next.

Focus Characters: Timothy Li, Gwendolyn Romulus, Samuel Knudsen

Go to: The Three

December 6, 2024: Breakthrough

Chapter Date: August 2285

Synopsis: A little bit into the journey to Venus, in the middle of the asteroid belt, Tim reaches out with his mind, and finds something not quite human.

Focus Characters: Timothy Li

Go to: Breakthrough

December 13, 2024: Mission

Story Date: July 2278

Synopsis: Jaedon Beyar (codename: Xavix) receives his secret mission from The King of Venus. And the king continues a long going feud with the official elected leadership of the Republic.

Focus Characters: Jaedon Beyar

Go to: Mission

December 13, 2024: Discovery

Story Date: April 1990

Synopsis: Allorien watches the launch of the Hubble Space Telescope and wishes it really could be used to discover what humanity needed to see.

Focus Character: Allorien

Go to: Discovery

December 20, 2024: Blow Up

Story Date: August 2273

Synopsis: A scientist who melds two oft separate practices becomes frustrated. Chancellor Fulton punishes his top generals. Cassandra Fulton, well, is Cassandra.

Focus Characters:Cassandra Fulton, Seraf√≠n Vera'Cruz

Go to: Blow Up

December 20, 2024: The Meeting

Story Date: September 2282

Synopsis: Alestra is recruited to work for Venusian Special forces. Using code name Ylena she pulls of a daring heist in an act unexpectedly defecting from the Terra Firma Special forces.

Focus Characters: Alestra Amalee (Ylena), Jaedon Beyar (Xavix)

Go to: The Meeting

Back to Top ↑

February 2025

February 21, 2025: Welcoming

Story Date: October 2285

Synopsis: After Retreating from Venus' space protections moving to Venus' Second Lagrange Point, Allorien is asked to come aboard Edith. Humans make contact with an alien species.

Focus Characters: Allorien, Timothy Li, Jaedon Beyar

Go to: Welcoming

February 28, 2025: The Pact

Story Date: July 2295

Synopsis: Ten years after meeting, Tim Li and Allorien head to the Crysix home world of Eblypso to sign a pact between the two species marking a step forward in the relations of the species.

Focus Characters:Timothy Li, Allorien, Fae

Go to: The Pact

Back to Top ↑

March 2025

March 8, 2025: Building

Story Date: February 2275

Synopsis: Chancellor Fulton leads his generals in building a plan to intimidate Terra Further. Cassandra has her own feelings about the project.

Focus Characters: Seraf√≠n Vera'Cruz, Cassandra Fulton

Go to: Building

March 14, 2025: Bridge

Story Date: December 2280

Synopsis: Prince Hedlund receives a back channel communication from Senator Pace, in an attempt to create a calmer future.

Focus Characters: Jamie Hedlund, Andrew Pace

Go to: Bridge

March 21, 2025: History Class

Story Date: January 2284

Synopsis: Nearly six years after being assigned the mission, Jaedon Beyar is teaching history and begins the process of saving three young people from prison.

Focus Characters:Jaedon Beyar, Timothy Li, Samuel Knudsen, Gwendolyn Romulus

Go to: History Class

March 28, 2025: The Wall

Story Date: September 2284

Synopsis: Gwen, Sam, & Tim explore the far reaches of the grounds of their university and find that there is much more to the world than they expected.

Focus Characters: Timothy Li, Gwendolyn Romulus, Samuel Knudsen

Go to: The Wall

Back to Top ↑

April 2025

April 4, 2025: Connection

Story Date: April 2271

Synopsis: Cassandra, at 13, makes a connection with a 14 year old thief. A connection that will last a very long time with a great deal of benefit to both parties.

Focus Characters: Alestra Amalee, Cassandra Fulton

Go to: Connection

April 18, 2025: Avalon

Story Date: October 2285

Synopsis: Jaedon tears through poisonous clouds of venus with everyone in his ship to reach Avalon Castle undetected. They all face a security system that had never seen a Crysix being before.

Focus Characters: Allorien, Jaedon Beyar, Timothy Li

Go to: Avalon

April 25, 2025: The Generals

Story Date: October 2285

Synopsis: Sam, Gwen & Tim are introduced to the two generals that will guide their skill development and more details surface about the Axion particle that powers the Crysix society.

Focus Characters:

Go To: The Generals

May 2025

May 9, 2025: Keeping Notes

Story Date: September 2282

Synopsis: Jamie learns a disturbing truth about his parents, and starts opening his mind to the history of humanity.

Focus Characters: Jame Hedlund

May 18, 2025: Projection

Story Date: October 2285, December 1984

Synopsis: An alien is seen a human spacecraft for the first time, and Tim witnesses a Crysix coming of age ceremony.

Focus Characters: Allorien, Timothy Li

Go To: Projection

August 2025

August 8, 2025: Reignite

Story Date: August 2175

Synopsis: Sai is on trial for violating her oath to watch humanity without interference, and old wound in the Crysix species reopens.

Focus Characters: Sai, Nhamashal

Go To: Reignite

August 15, 2025: Representation

Story Date: July 2278

Synopsis: King Romulus witnesses Le'Rue abandoning the lives of Sam and Tim to save the king's daughter when he could have saved all three.

Focus Characters: Andrew Pace, King Romulus, Xavier Le'Rue

Go To: Representation

August 22, 2025: Polymer Twins

Story Date: September 2292

Synopsis: Tim & Allorien travel to Pluto with Sen. Pace, traveling though the Polymer Twins that protect Pluto.

Focus Characters: Andrew Pace, Tim Li, Allorien

Go to: Polymer Twins

August 29, 2025: Backdoor

Story Date:January 2025

Synopsis: A backdoor built into the government of the United States decades ago gets triggered and locks down some key data that is needed to enforce power and restart the cycle.

Focus Characters: Allorien

Go To: Backdoor
